t: Amazon Go is a new kind of corner store
s: One of the ways Amazon Go is different is that it's powered by Amazon's Just Walk Out shopping. Just Walk Out shopping lets you skip a traditional checkout when you pay with your Amazon app (or through a payment method that's already tied to your account). Once inside the store, shop like normal.

t: Amazon Go - Wikipedia
s: 2 days ago - In 2023, Amazon announced it would close eight Amazon Go stores in Seattle, New York City and San Francisco. On April 4, 2024, it was revealed that Amazon's "Just Walk Out" technology was supported by approximately 1,000 Indian workers who manually reviewed transactions.

t: Amazon's Just Walk Out technology relies on hundreds of workers in India watching you shop
s: April 3, 2024 - Just Walk Out first appeared in Amazon Go convenience stores. The technology allowed customers to enter a store by identifying themselves with their Amazon account.

t: Amazon's Just Walk Out stores relied on '1,000 people in India watching,' not AI - Washington Times
s: May 6, 2024 - While Amazon's Just Walk Out technology at its Fresh grocery stores was touted as being powered by artificial intelligence, a new report says it actually relied heavily on manual monitoring by some 1,000 people in India.
